description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows mobile broadband driver related to CVE-2024-30000:

1. Download and apply the relevant updates for your Windows version from the provided links below.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Updates for Windows 11 and Windows 10 can be found at the following links:  
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)  
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)  
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)  
- These updates address an integer overflow vulnerability in the mobile broadband driver. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the supported Windows versions listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
